autoRefresh.title: Auto-reload on update
autoRefresh.description: Automatically reload when the file is updated. The window can be refreshed manually by press `F5` in pdf-viewer.

autoTime.title: Auto-refresh delay
autoTime.description: The time in ms before reloading the pdf-viewer after the last detected change.

closeDeleted.title: Close panel if file deleted
closeDeleted.description: Set to true to automatically close the pdf-viewer when the disk file is deleted.

invertMode.title: Invert colors
invertMode.description: Inverts the colours of the pages. This flag can be toggled by command `pdf-viewer:invert-mode`. It can be toggled per file by press `F8` in pdf-viewer.

synctexPath.title: Path to SyncTeX binary
synctexPath.description: Used for forward and reverse lookup, if the PDF has been generated with SyncTeX.

debug.title: Debug
debug.description: Show some errors in console e.g. Synctex.

scrollMapState.title: Scroll Map
scrollMapState.description: Display outline markers on scroll bar.

scrollMapThreshold.title: Scroll Map Threshold
scrollMapThreshold.description: Maximum number of markers to display. The limit doesn't apply if zero.
